name: Hot Krush IPA
description: When our head brewer Rune gets obsessed with efficiency, beautiful things happen. This 2025 Malt Stars creation proves efficiency can be delicious. Shortened boils, energy-smart kveik yeast, and zero-waste brewing meet Krush and Idaho 7 hops for serious tropical chaos.

name: To Øl x Brujos - Tres Hekse Triple IPA
description: Cross-continental hop witchcraft with our friends at Brujos — Idaho 7, Citra, Simcoe, and experimental Rakau from New Zealand for extra tropical juiciness. This hazy triple hits with tropical aromatics that'll transport you from Copenhagen to Mexico City in one sip.

name: #IPA
description: This is a 'modern' IPA using a blend of simcoe, amarillo, and citra hops. It is a bit hazy, but not like #DIPA level. Rather than trying to make the richest flavor on the planet, it is a good balance between drinkability and juicy flavor, which is the latest way IPAs are trending.

name: Snuble Juice
description: Gluten Free Session IPA. 'Snuble' means 'stumble' 'Juice' means 'highly aromatic irresistible refreshing liquid'. We've fallen head over heels for this.

name: Dim Lights
description: Brewed with a complex and chocolatey blend of malts, wheat, and oats for a silky mouthfeel. Hopped gently with Amarillo for a touch of orange and light bitterness.

name: Mumbo Jumbo #6
description: Part of the Mumbo Jumbo series, this beer is inspired by a classic Danish dessert. It combines the flavors of ripe strawberries, tangy rhubarb, and a hint of vanilla.

name: Afterschool Club
description: A silky, full-bodied, and juicy IPA with a curious blend of hops that impart notes of stone fruit, pineapple, and peaches.

name: Citrea
description: A bright, energetic, and citrusy Gose packed with blood orange, lime, and lemon, finished with a touch of salt.

name: Stolen Red Berries
description: The first of the "Stolen" series, this beer is a tart and refreshing Berliner Weisse brewed with raspberry, black cherries, black currant, red currant, and blackberry.

name: A Bit Chilly
description: A Baltic Porter with notes of dark winter fruits, molasses, and rich chocolate, followed by a touch of smoke carried by a cold sea breeze.

name: Fluff
description: A bright yellow and fluffy wheat beer with delicate notes of banana and clove.

name: Birch
description: A clean and zippy pilsner brewed with German hops like Hallertauer Mittelfrüh and Tettnang.

name: Larch
description: A take on a classic Vienna Lager for everyday enjoyment, with a balanced blend of malts and Hallertauer Mittelfrüh hops.

name: Big Bang Barley Wine 2024
description: The third in a series of vintage Barley Wines. A beautifully clear and copper-colored beer with a delicate bitterness and a hoppy aroma.

name: Big Bang Barley Wine 2023
description: The second in a line of vintage Barley Wines. Brewed with heaps of hops and a sprinkle of caramel malts, with notes of browned sugar and warmth.

name: Mumbo Jumbo #1
description: A full, slightly sour, and lightly salted gose brewed with passion fruit, guava, and raspberries. Part of the Mumbo Jumbo series.

name: Occulation BA Rum
description: Part of the Occulation series, this beer is an Imperial Stout aged in an old rum barrel for 274 days.
